column5: Anyone else see Neil Young in London tonight?  Just got in and what a great show!  He played for over 2 hours and played All Along The Watchtower as his encore.  Definitely one of the loudest standing ovations I've experienced before he came back out for his last song.  Supposedly he hasn't played here in something like 35 years.
Yea hes going to Saskatoon, I would love to see his show, but I think Ill save my money for ZZ Top instead.
Glad to hear it was a good show. Im going to see him in the Soo tomorrow...can't wait.
Seen him last fall in Ottawa---"The Best"  Bushart
who was the opening act? curious if i should try to get there to see it, or just make sure i am there for the start of Uncle Neil

a friend attended a concert in Kingston the other day and said she was floored by the performance. Apparently he was doing a lot of songs never done in concert before.  He performed this tune fore first time in concert. Great campfire type of song. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CzTR2AksX0c...PL&index=21
